entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING , Elbow
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 12:12 PM CST Wednesday 28 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: -15.2°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Elbow 1:00 PM CST Wednesday 28 December 2022

Pressure / Tendency: 99.8 kPa rising
Humidity: 79 %

Wind: N 33 km/h

entry.title: Wednesday: Periods of snow. High minus 12.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Wind north 20 km/h. High minus 12. Wind chill near minus 23. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CST Wednesday 28 December 2022

entry.title: Wednesday night: Periods of light snow. Low minus 20. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of light snow. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 20. Wind chill minus 19 this evening and minus 24 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CST Wednesday 28 December 2022

entry.title: Thursday: Periods of light snow. High minus 14. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 30 percent chance of light snow early in the morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 14. Wind chill minus 28 in the morning and minus 20 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CST Wednesday 28 December 2022
